projects.title: Game of Life
projects.description: I previous worked on a project where I model Conway's Game of Life in C.

projects.title: Composite Links
projects.description: My field of research deals in a subsection of Knot Theory known as composite links.

projects.title: Random Thick Knots
projects.description: New research into the study of random knots that are modelled after physical knots with the addition of having thickness.

projects.title: Word Model
projects.description: In CISC 230: Object Oriented Programming, I designed a model in Java for words.

projects.title: Directory Probe
projects.description: Using a model of a stack of queues, I created a program that can probe a given directory.

projects.title: UST3400 Assembler
projects.description: Together with Leah Emerson, we constructed a program that functions as an assembler that follows similar guidelines to mips
